程序包的使用
syntaxtree

  • 使用syntaxtree的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    piglet  
    syntaxtree  
    visitor  
  • piglet使用的syntaxtree中的类 
    类和说明
    BinOp
    Grammar production: f0 -> Operator() f1 -> Exp() f2 -> Exp()
    Call
    Grammar production: f0 -> "CALL" f1 -> Exp() f2 -> "(" f3 -> ( Exp() )* f4 -> ")"
    CJumpStmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> "CJUMP" f1 -> Exp() f2 -> Label()
    ErrorStmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> "ERROR"
    Exp
    Grammar production: f0 -> StmtExp() | Call() | HAllocate() | BinOp() | Temp() | IntegerLiteral() | Label()
    Goal
    Grammar production: f0 -> "MAIN" f1 -> StmtList() f2 -> "END" f3 -> ( Procedure() )* f4 ->
    HAllocate
    Grammar production: f0 -> "HALLOCATE" f1 -> Exp()
    HLoadStmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> "HLOAD" f1 -> Temp() f2 -> Exp() f3 -> IntegerLiteral()
    HStoreStmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> "HSTORE" f1 -> Exp() f2 -> IntegerLiteral() f3 -> Exp()
    IntegerLiteral
    Grammar production: f0 ->
    JumpStmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> "JUMP" f1 -> Label()
    Label
    Grammar production: f0 ->
    MoveStmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> "MOVE" f1 -> Temp() f2 -> Exp()
    NodeToken
    Represents a single token in the grammar.
    NoOpStmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> "NOOP"
    Operator
    Grammar production: f0 -> "LT" | "PLUS" | "MINUS" | "TIMES"
    PrintStmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> "PRINT" f1 -> Exp()
    Procedure
    Grammar production: f0 -> Label() f1 -> "[" f2 -> IntegerLiteral() f3 -> "]" f4 -> StmtExp()
    Stmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> NoOpStmt() | ErrorStmt() | CJumpStmt() | JumpStmt() | HStoreStmt() | HLoadStmt() | MoveStmt() | PrintStmt()
    StmtExp
    Grammar production: f0 -> "BEGIN" f1 -> StmtList() f2 -> "RETURN" f3 -> Exp() f4 -> "END"
    StmtList
    Grammar production: f0 -> ( ( Label() )?
    Temp
    Grammar production: f0 -> "TEMP" f1 -> IntegerLiteral()
  • syntaxtree使用的syntaxtree中的类 
    类和说明
    Exp
    Grammar production: f0 -> StmtExp() | Call() | HAllocate() | BinOp() | Temp() | IntegerLiteral() | Label()
    IntegerLiteral
    Grammar production: f0 ->
    Label
    Grammar production: f0 ->
    Node
    The interface which all syntax tree classes must implement.
    NodeChoice
    Represents a grammar choice, e.g. ( A | B )
    NodeListInterface
    The interface which NodeList, NodeListOptional, and NodeSequence implement.
    NodeListOptional
    Represents an optional grammar list, e.g. ( A )*
    NodeToken
    Represents a single token in the grammar.
    Operator
    Grammar production: f0 -> "LT" | "PLUS" | "MINUS" | "TIMES"
    StmtExp
    Grammar production: f0 -> "BEGIN" f1 -> StmtList() f2 -> "RETURN" f3 -> Exp() f4 -> "END"
    StmtList
    Grammar production: f0 -> ( ( Label() )?
    Temp
    Grammar production: f0 -> "TEMP" f1 -> IntegerLiteral()
  • visitor使用的syntaxtree中的类 
    类和说明
    BinOp
    Grammar production: f0 -> Operator() f1 -> Exp() f2 -> Exp()
    Call
    Grammar production: f0 -> "CALL" f1 -> Exp() f2 -> "(" f3 -> ( Exp() )* f4 -> ")"
    CJumpStmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> "CJUMP" f1 -> Exp() f2 -> Label()
    ErrorStmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> "ERROR"
    Exp
    Grammar production: f0 -> StmtExp() | Call() | HAllocate() | BinOp() | Temp() | IntegerLiteral() | Label()
    Goal
    Grammar production: f0 -> "MAIN" f1 -> StmtList() f2 -> "END" f3 -> ( Procedure() )* f4 ->
    HAllocate
    Grammar production: f0 -> "HALLOCATE" f1 -> Exp()
    HLoadStmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> "HLOAD" f1 -> Temp() f2 -> Exp() f3 -> IntegerLiteral()
    HStoreStmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> "HSTORE" f1 -> Exp() f2 -> IntegerLiteral() f3 -> Exp()
    IntegerLiteral
    Grammar production: f0 ->
    JumpStmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> "JUMP" f1 -> Label()
    Label
    Grammar production: f0 ->
    MoveStmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> "MOVE" f1 -> Temp() f2 -> Exp()
    NodeList
    Represents a grammar list, e.g. ( A )+
    NodeListOptional
    Represents an optional grammar list, e.g. ( A )*
    NodeOptional
    Represents an grammar optional node, e.g. ( A )?
    NodeSequence
    Represents a sequence of nodes nested within a choice, list, optional list, or optional, e.g. ( A B )+ or [ C D E ]
    NodeToken
    Represents a single token in the grammar.
    NoOpStmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> "NOOP"
    Operator
    Grammar production: f0 -> "LT" | "PLUS" | "MINUS" | "TIMES"
    PrintStmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> "PRINT" f1 -> Exp()
    Procedure
    Grammar production: f0 -> Label() f1 -> "[" f2 -> IntegerLiteral() f3 -> "]" f4 -> StmtExp()
    Stmt
    Grammar production: f0 -> NoOpStmt() | ErrorStmt() | CJumpStmt() | JumpStmt() | HStoreStmt() | HLoadStmt() | MoveStmt() | PrintStmt()
    StmtExp
    Grammar production: f0 -> "BEGIN" f1 -> StmtList() f2 -> "RETURN" f3 -> Exp() f4 -> "END"
    StmtList
    Grammar production: f0 -> ( ( Label() )?
    Temp
    Grammar production: f0 -> "TEMP" f1 -> IntegerLiteral()
